Avondale.Agua Fria Union High School District:
The Agua Fria Union High School District is a high school district serving Goodyear, Buckeye, Avondale, Waddell and Litchfield Park, Arizona. It was founded in 1955.


== Schools ==


=== Notes ===
Agua Fria Union High School has undergone continuous expansion and modernization since it opened in the fall of 1955, though it maintains its rich heritage and tradition.
